definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 16:9 shout, shouting, cheer (of a multitude; on formation compare Ol:§181 a Sta:§ 218 b);—´[[ה]] only abs., Is 16:9 + 6t. Is & Je;—

shouting in harvest Is 16:10, Je 48:33, Je 48:33, Je 48:33 where [[לאׁ יִדְרׂח חֵידָד הֵידָד לאׁ הֵידָד]], i.e. the shouting is no vineyard-shouting, but that of foe, cf. infr.; comp. Je 25:30 ´[[י]] shall utter ([[עָנׇה]]) a shout like the (grape-) treaders (sq. [[אֶל כָּל־ישְׁבֵי הָאָרֶץ]]). Hence also
shout of the foe Is 16:9 ([[נׇפַל עַל]]), Je 51:14 ([[וְעָנוּ עָלַיִח הֵידָד]]); cf. Je 25:30, Je 48:33 supr.
